# AegisX Admin (Documentation Site)

> Angular documentation site showcasing AegisX UI component library with live examples and API documentation.

## Overview

The `apps/admin` is an Angular documentation application featuring:
- Component documentation (Shadcn/ui style)
- Live component previews
- API reference documentation
- Interactive demos
- Theme playground
- Material Design documentation

## Quick Start

```bash
# Development
pnpm nx serve admin --port=4250

# Build
pnpm nx build admin

# Access
http://localhost:4250
```

---

## Architecture

```
apps/admin/src/app/
├── app.ts               # App component with navigation
├── app.routes.ts        # Documentation routes
├── components/          # Documentation components
├── pages/               # Page components
│   ├── docs/            # Documentation pages
│   ├── playground/      # Interactive demos
│   ├── his-demo/        # Healthcare demo
│   ├── inventory-demo/  # Inventory demo
│   └── enterprise-demo/ # Enterprise layout demo
├── services/            # App services
└── types/               # TypeScript types
```

---

## Documentation Structure

### Getting Started
| Path | Component | Description |
|------|-----------|-------------|
| `/docs/getting-started/introduction` | IntroductionDocComponent | Library introduction |
| `/docs/getting-started/installation` | InstallationDocComponent | Installation guide |
| `/docs/getting-started/quick-start` | QuickStartDocComponent | Quick start guide |

### Foundations
| Path | Component | Description |
|------|-----------|-------------|
| `/docs/foundations/overview` | FoundationsOverviewComponent | Design foundations |
| `/docs/foundations/design-tokens` | DesignTokensComponent | CSS variables |
| `/docs/foundations/colors` | ColorsDocComponent | Color system |
| `/docs/foundations/typography` | TypographyDocComponent | Typography scale |
| `/docs/foundations/spacing` | SpacingDocComponent | Spacing system |

### AegisX Components
| Category | Components |
|----------|------------|
| **Data Display** | Card, Avatar, Badge, Timeline, Calendar, KPI Card, Stats Card |
| **Forms** | File Upload, Date Picker, Popup Edit, Knob |
| **Feedback** | Alert, Toast, Skeleton, Loading Bar, Inner Loading |
| **Navigation** | Breadcrumb, Stepper, Launcher |
| **Layout** | Drawer, Splitter, Compact, Empty, Enterprise |
| **Utilities** | Theme Switcher, Layout Switcher |
| **Dashboard** | Widget Framework, Gridster |

### Angular Material
| Path | Component | Description |
|------|-----------|-------------|
| `/docs/material/button` | MaterialButtonDocComponent | Button documentation |
| `/docs/material/card` | MaterialCardDocComponent | Card documentation |
| `/docs/material/table` | MaterialTableDocComponent | Table documentation |
| ... | ... | (30+ Material components) |

---

## Documentation Components

### DocHeaderComponent
```html
<ax-doc-header
  title="Button"
  icon="smart_button"
  description="Buttons allow users to take actions"
  [breadcrumbs]="[...]"
  status="stable"
  version="1.0.0"
  importStatement="import { AxButtonComponent } from '@aegisx/ui';"
/>
```

### CodeTabsComponent
```html
<ax-code-tabs [tabs]="[
  { label: 'HTML', language: 'html', code: '...' },
  { label: 'TypeScript', language: 'typescript', code: '...' },
]" />
```

### LivePreviewComponent
```html
<ax-live-preview variant="bordered">
  <button mat-raised-button>Preview Button</button>
</ax-live-preview>
```

### PropsTableComponent
```html
<ax-props-table [props]="[
  { name: 'variant', type: 'string', default: 'primary', description: '...' },
]" />
```

### ComponentTokensComponent
```html
<ax-component-tokens [tokens]="[
  { token: '--ax-button-bg', value: 'var(--ax-brand-default)' },
]" />
```

---

## Demo Applications

### HIS Demo (Healthcare)
Hospital Information System demo:
- Dashboard
- Patient management
- Appointments
- Appointment Calendar (FullCalendar)
- Lab Results
- Pharmacy
- Reports

### Inventory Demo
Inventory management demo:
- Dashboard
- Stock management
- Purchase orders
- Suppliers
- Reports

### Enterprise Demo
Enterprise layout demonstration with:
- Sidebar navigation
- Header with user menu
- Breadcrumbs
- Theme switching

### Widget Demo
Dashboard widget framework demo:
- Draggable widgets
- Configurable grid
- Multiple widget types

### Gridster Demo
Draggable grid layout demo:
- Grid configuration
- Widget management
- Layout persistence

---

## Page Components

### Documentation Page Pattern
```typescript
@Component({
  selector: 'ax-button-doc',
  standalone: true,
  imports: [
    MatTabsModule,
    DocHeaderComponent,
    CodeTabsComponent,
    LivePreviewComponent,
    PropsTableComponent,
  ],
  template: `
    <div class="button-doc">
      <ax-doc-header ... />

      <mat-tab-group>
        <mat-tab label="Overview">
          <ax-live-preview>...</ax-live-preview>
          <ax-code-tabs [tabs]="basicCode" />
        </mat-tab>

        <mat-tab label="API">
          <ax-props-table [props]="props" />
        </mat-tab>

        <mat-tab label="Examples">
          ...
        </mat-tab>
      </mat-tab-group>
    </div>
  `,
})
export class ButtonDocComponent {
  basicCode = [...];
  props = [...];
}
```

---

## Navigation Structure

The documentation uses `docsNavigation` array in `app.ts`:

```typescript
docsNavigation = [
  {
    id: 'getting-started',
    title: 'Getting Started',
    children: [
      { id: 'introduction', title: 'Introduction', link: '...' },
      { id: 'installation', title: 'Installation', link: '...' },
    ],
  },
  {
    id: 'components',
    title: 'Components',
    children: [
      {
        id: 'data-display',
        title: 'Data Display',
        children: [...],
      },
      // More categories...
    ],
  },
];
```

---

## Styling

### Documentation Styles
Common styles for documentation pages:

```scss
.doc-page {
  max-width: 1200px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: var(--ax-spacing-xl);
}

.doc-section {
  margin-bottom: var(--ax-spacing-3xl);

  h2 {
    font-size: var(--ax-text-xl);
    font-weight: 600;
    margin-bottom: var(--ax-spacing-sm);
  }
}
```

---

## Playground Pages

### Component Showcase
Interactive component demonstrations:
- All AegisX UI components
- Live editing
- Code examples

### Theme Playground
Theme customization:
- Color picker
- Typography settings
- Spacing adjustments
- Preview in real-time

### Login Demo
Authentication UI demo:
- Login form
- Registration form
- Password reset

### Dashboard Demo
Dashboard layout demo:
- Widget grid
- KPI cards
- Charts
- Activity feed

---

## Development

### Adding New Documentation

1. Create component in `pages/docs/components/aegisx/{category}/`
2. Add route in `app.routes.ts`
3. Add navigation item in `app.ts` docsNavigation
4. Create index.ts export

### Documentation Template
```typescript
@Component({
  selector: 'ax-{component}-doc',
  template: `
    <div class="{component}-doc">
      <ax-doc-header
        title="{Component Name}"
        icon="{icon}"
        description="{description}"
        [breadcrumbs]="[...]"
        status="stable"
        version="1.0.0"
        importStatement="import { ... } from '@aegisx/ui';"
      />

      <mat-tab-group>
        <mat-tab label="Overview">...</mat-tab>
        <mat-tab label="API">...</mat-tab>
        <mat-tab label="Examples">...</mat-tab>
        <mat-tab label="Guidelines">...</mat-tab>
      </mat-tab-group>
    </div>
  `,
})
```

---

## File Structure Reference

```
apps/admin/src/app/
├── app.ts
├── app.routes.ts
├── components/
│   ├── docs/
│   │   ├── doc-header/
│   │   ├── code-tabs/
│   │   ├── live-preview/
│   │   ├── props-table/
│   │   └── component-tokens/
│   ├── code-block/
│   ├── code-preview/
│   └── example-box/
├── pages/
│   ├── docs/
│   │   ├── getting-started/
│   │   ├── foundations/
│   │   ├── components/
│   │   │   ├── aegisx/
│   │   │   │   ├── data-display/
│   │   │   │   ├── forms/
│   │   │   │   ├── feedback/
│   │   │   │   ├── navigation/
│   │   │   │   ├── layout/
│   │   │   │   ├── utilities/
│   │   │   │   └── dashboard/
│   │   │   └── material/
│   │   ├── patterns/
│   │   └── integrations/
│   ├── playground/
│   ├── his-demo/
│   ├── inventory-demo/
│   ├── enterprise-demo/
│   ├── widget-demo/
│   ├── gridster-demo/
│   ├── gridster-poc/
│   ├── app-launcher/
│   └── app-launcher-demo/
├── services/
└── types/
```
